attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road pricing (like the congestion charge)is yet another form of punitive taxation. Hard pressed motorists have already paid for the roads we drive on many times over...motorists are voters too, use your vote and kill it now.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the idea of "road pricing"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12088.asp

Prime Minister's Office
